textBox.richText: We are still working on the issues with Snow Leopard and crashing. However since the beta is due to expire we have updated the beta. This latest beta will work on Snow Leopard but the thumbnails are temporarily disabled (part of the cause of the crash on Snow Leopard). As soon as we have everything working correctly we will update the site (and the update feed) with a new build. You can download the latest beta from here. We do apologize for this issue and are working to track down the remaining Snow Leopard compatibility issues.
